title.@value: Extremely low birth weight of newborn

definition.@value: Newborn birth weight 999 g or less. Infants have increased morbidity including neurosensory disability, cerebral palsy, retinopathy of prematurity, deafness, pulmonary immaturity, chronic lung disease and subnormal cognitive function.

codingNote.@value: When both birth weight and gestational age are available, priority of assignment should be given to birth weight.
